name: Kyaiin no Tanoshi Mail: PS. I Love You
overview: Kyaiin no Tanoshi Mail - PS. I Love You is a simulation game in which the player can create custom postcards chossing backgrounds, messages, letters colors, etc. The player can also check the calendar and dates, etc. At the beggining of the game the player can choose between 2 different kind of keyboards. The game also have some Pocketstation features.
